name: Trust Music
description:
A game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 30

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-30/?action=preview&uid=16828

Play with sound!!!

Play Fullscreen!!

WASD to move, mouse to look around, SPACE to close/open eyes, any key (BUT SPACE) to play a chord.

Made in GooCreate https://www.goocreate.com/
